title: 我認為值得推薦的遊戲
title_en: I think the game is worth recommending
content: 我認為Car Parking是一款PE端不錯的駕駛休閒遊戲 我推薦它的原因: 1. 它擁有汽車250+輛 2. 支持自定義的改裝 3. 多人模式 4. 這是一款有10年左右的老遊戲，值得信賴
content_en: I think Car Parking is a good driving casual game on the PE side. I recommend it for the following reasons: 1. It has 250 + cars. 2. It supports custom modifications. 3. Multiplayer mode. 4. It is an old game about 10 years old and trustworthy
